name: ReMoDDeD
savepath: Another large update with many different changes, especially for runes and runewords. The new implementation of our 'Runic Forging System' and the re-worked Superior items upgrades are both available now. A New rune and new rune Tier have been added, with all supporting systems being enabled for them. And as usual, we have our healthy round of user suggestions and bug fixes to round things out. Another exciting update I hope everyone enjoys!

Along with the 0.9.9.8B Update, comes updates to some of our other custom programs also: D2RLaunch and The Vault. D2RLaunch has been updated to 2.4.2 to fix Vault updating and The Vault has been updated to 1.1.6 to fix many issues as well as update the item catalog. Please update both along with the mod files for best results. You may want to clear config data to re-generate the item catalog.
